entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
